description: Try our easy to follow Campbell’s Quick Oven Baked Chicken Risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lunch,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Campbell’s Quick Oven Baked Chicken Risotto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup shredded basil leaves (plus extra leaves to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan. Cook chicken for 3-4 mins until browned.

Add rice and cook, stirring until coated. Add Campbell’s Real Stock and bring it to the boil. Cover and bake for 20-25 mins or until the rice is tender. Remove from the oven, stir through basil and parmesan.
Serve topped with extra basil leaves and parmesan.
